title: GBRB: Reap What You Sow
overview: Korea's renowned celebrities who are best friends in real life, venture away from the urban hustle and bustle to a remote 'FARM,' taking part in an organic harvest challenge and relishing the joys of countryside living. They will do daily tasks like real-life harvesting, while also indulging in lighthearted, impromptu games. This show offers viewers a glimpse into rural life and the efforts required to cultivate crops from seed to harvest.
